headline: Workday Named a Leader in 2025 Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for Talent Acquisition (Recruiting) Suites
summary: Workday, Inc. (NASDAQ: WDAY), the AI platform for managing people, money, and agents, has been named a Leader in the inaugural Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for Talent Acquisition (Recruiting) Suites. A complimentary copy of the report is available here.
